chapters.title: Chapter 7: A Goatpen
chapters.info: Maighdin Dorlain, p. 168 (181)—A young woman that Perrin encounters who is fleeing Amadicia. She does not reveal her true identity, Morgase Trakand of Andor, but uses her mother's name as a disguise. The surname comes from an estate in Andor that Morgase owned before she became Queen. See also Trakand, Morgase.
